name: CVE-2022-32602
description: In keyinstall, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07388790; Issue ID: ALPS07388790.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:android:12.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6833:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6883:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8765:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8766:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8768:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8786:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8789:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8791:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8797:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt6983:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8183:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8185:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8321:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8385:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8675:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:mediatek:mt8791t:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
